2.en: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.

3.en: LARVITAR is born deep under the ground. To come up to the surface, this POKéMON must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so, LARVITAR cannot see its parent’s face.

4.en: A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it has eaten a large mountain, it goes to sleep so it can grow.

5.en: A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it has eaten a large mountain, it goes to sleep so it can grow.

6.en: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it falls asleep so it can grow.
6.ja: 土を　食べて　生きている。 大きな　山ひとつ　食べ終わると 成長のため　眠りはじめる。

7.en: Born underground, it eats its way through dirt to the surface, where its parents are. It doesn’t deal well with the bright light it finds there.
7.ja: 地下で　生まれ　土を　食いながら 親の　いる　地上を　目指す。 まぶしいので　光は　苦手だよ。

8.en: Born deep underground, it comes aboveground and becomes a pupa once it has finished eating the surrounding soil.
8.ja: 地底　奥深くで　生まれる。 まわりの　土を　たいらげると 地上に　現われ　サナギになる。

2.en: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its THRASHING can topple a mountain.

3.en: PUPITAR creates a gas inside its body that it compresses and forcefully ejects to propel itself like a jet. The body is very durable - it avoids damage even if it hits solid steel.

4.en: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.

5.en: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.

6.en: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.
6.ja: 岩盤のような　硬い　体。 圧縮した　ガスを　噴射して まるで　ロケットのように　飛び出す。

7.en: This troublesome Pokémon can’t wait to evolve, so it relieves its stress by wildly propelling itself around using compressed gas.
7.ja: 進化を　待てず　圧縮ガスで 飛びまわり　暴れて　ストレスを 解消する　迷惑な　ポケモン。

8.en: Even sealed in its shell, it can move freely. Hard and fast, it has outstanding destructive power.
8.ja: 殻に　被われているが　自由に 飛びまわれる。　硬さと　速さを もつので　破壊力　抜群だ。

2.en: Its body can't be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.

3.en: TYRANITAR is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. This POKéMON wanders about in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.

4.en: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.

5.en: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.

6.en: In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to make the ground shake and mountains crumble.
6.ja: 片腕を　動かしただけで 山を崩し　地響きを　起こす とてつもない　パワーを　秘める。

7.en: It wanders through the mountains seeking opponents to fight. If it finds an opponent that’s not worthy, Tyranitar ignores it and wanders on.
7.ja: 戦う　相手を　求めて　山を さ迷う。　出会っても　格下が 相手だと　無視して　去っていく。

8.en: Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.
8.ja: どんな　攻撃にも　びくともしない 体を　もっているため どんどん　勝負を　仕掛けてくる。

2.en: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.

3.en: LUGIA’s wings pack devastating power - a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this POKéMON chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

4.en: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.

5.en: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.

6.en: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.
6.ja: 深い　海溝の　底で　眠る。 ルギアが　羽ばたくと　４０日 嵐が　続くと　言われている。

2.en: Legends claim this POKéMON flies the world's skies con­ tinuously on its magnificent seven- colored wings.

3.en: HO-OH’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This POKéMON is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

4.en: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.

5.en: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.

6.en: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.
6.ja: 体は　七色に　輝き 飛んだあとは　虹が　できると 神話に　残されている　ポケモン。

2.en: This POKéMON wan­ ders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.

3.en: This POKéMON came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as CELEBI appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.

4.en: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.

5.en: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.

6.en: This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
6.ja: 時間を超えて　あちこち　さまよう。 セレビィが　姿を　現した　森は 草木が　生い茂るという。

8.en: This Pokémon has the ability to move through time. Records describing it as a forest deity can be found from many different eras.
8.ja: 時を　超える　力を　もつ。 森の　神様として　さまざまな 時代に　記録が　残されている。
